import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const NeedHelpUpdate=(props)=>{ const {id} =useParams() console.log(id) const [devise, setDevise] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetchOneNeedHelp(id).then(data=>setDevise(data))},[]) console.log(devise) return (
setName(e.target.value)}>
setCity(e.target.value)}>
setPhone(e.target.value)}>
setlistThings(e.target.value)}>
setsecondName(e.target.value)}>
); } export default NeedHelpUpdate
